title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, etc. locally via a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official npm package providing a thin JavaScript/TypeScript wrapper over Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter giving drop-in LLM, chat and embeddings interfaces backed by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG and admin panel.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Interactive CLI tool that wraps the Ollama REST API with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin bringing local Ollama models in as inline code-completion copilots.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via any Ollama model; supports slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot server streaming Ollama responses in private or group chats.

title: ollama4j (Java SDK)
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs for chat, generate, pull and embeddings.

title: ollama-rs (Rust crate)
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing typed wrappers over the Ollama REST endpoints.

title: ollama-gui (Electron desktop app)
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models built on Electron and React.

title: ollama-codex.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin offering OpenAI-Codex-like code generation powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on that runs Ollama inside the supervisor, exposing models to automations.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Official registry of 100+ community-contributed Modelfiles (Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, Zephyr…).

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that streams Ollama responses and allows per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Experimental gRPC proxy in front of Ollama REST API for high-throughput services.

title: reddit/r/ollama – Model discussion thread
summary: Community benchmarks and tips comparing Gemma 2 7B vs Mistral 7B running via Ollama.

title: Hacker News – Show HN: Self-hosted AI coding assistant with Ollama
summary: Developer showcases a VS Code extension that pairs Ollama models with vector search for private code-assist.
